Qualifiers.Scope: Standards for the design, placement, and dimensions of excavated features such as light wells and stairwells.
Qualifiers.Applicability: Applies to all excavated features (light wells, stairwells) on a property, particularly in relation to required yards and setbacks.
Qualifiers.Exclusions: Features are not permitted on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

Variables.feature_width: The interior dimension of the width of a single excavated feature.
Variables.combined_length_all_features: The sum of the interior lengths of all excavated features on the property, excluding the encasing structure.
Variables.basement_perimeter: The total perimeter of the building's basement.
Variables.side_yard_encroachment: The distance a feature extends into a required side yard.
Variables.distance_from_side_lot_line: The distance from the feature to the side lot line.
Variables.rear_yard_encroachment: The distance a feature extends into a required rear yard.
Variables.combined_length_encroaching_features: The sum of the interior lengths of all features or portions of features that encroach into any required yard (side or rear).

Constants.measurement_basis: Measurements are based on the interior dimension of the opening and exclude the encasing structure.

Conditions.Mandatory: The drainage system for the features must be approved by the Public Works Department.
Conditions.Conditional Logic: IF a feature encroaches into a required side yard, THEN the encroachment must be <= 3 feet AND the feature must be >= 3 feet from the side lot line.
Conditions.Mandatory (Ambiguous): Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees. (Note: 'harmful' is not quantitatively defined, making automated validation difficult).

Exceptions.Explicit Deviations: None specified in the provided text.
Exceptions.Alternatives: None specified in the provided text.
Exceptions.Special Cases: None specified in the provided text.

Relationships.Hierarchical: These standards are a component of overall site planning regulations.
Relationships.Cross-references: Refers to 'Figure 39' for visual examples. Requires procedural approval from an external entity: 'Public Works Department'.
Relationships.Logical Dependencies: The total length of encroaching features (max 15') is a subset of the total length of all features (max 30% of basement perimeter). The side yard encroachment rule is a compound condition with two constraints that must both be met.
